data.title: the super: Latest News & Videos, Photos about the super
data.meta_description: the super Latest Breaking News, Pictures, Videos, and Special Reports from The Economic Times. the super  Blogs, Comments and Archive News on Economictimes.com
data.text:
Go To Page 1

Wall St Week Ahead: 'Super Bowl' Nvidia earnings stand to test searing AI trade

Nvidia's upcoming earnings report could impact U.S. stock markets, which have recovered from recent losses. The company's stock has surged 150% this year, heavily influencing the S&P 500's performance. Investors await guidance on future AI investments to gauge market direction during a historically volatile period in September.

24 Aug, 2024, 09:28 AM IST

Harris's polling numbers are less rosy as compared to Trump? Here's what super PAC president says

Supporters of Kamala Harris shouldn't be overly optimistic and sanguine about recent polls showing her ahead of Donald Trump.

24 Aug, 2024, 12:09 AM IST

Flipkart-backed SuperMoney launches UPI app

Super.Money, the fintech wing of Flipkart, debuted its credit-first UPI app post a beta phase with 10 million transactions. The venture plans to introduce new financial products, targeting a significant position in India's UPI sector.

21 Aug, 2024, 06:28 PM IST

Senior Citizens special FDs: Check these 2 banks' special FDs for senior, super senior citizens

21 Aug, 2024, 04:58 PM IST

Kamala Harris super PAC founder says public polls are too optimistic

Chauncey McLean, president of Future Forward, the main outside spending group backing Kamala Harris' presidential bid, revealed that their internal polling shows a much closer race than public polls suggest. Speaking at an event hosted by the University of Chicago Institute of Politics on Monday, McLean highlighted this concern.

20 Aug, 2024, 06:58 AM IST

Super Blue Moon: When can you watch the rare celestial event in US?

Skygazers in the United States will have the chance to witness a remarkable celestial eventâ€”a rare "super blue moon." This occurrence uniquely blends the features of both a supermoon and a blue moon.

19 Aug, 2024, 05:40 PM IST

Super Blue Moon 2024 Astrology: Zodiac-wise horoscope predictions for full moon, blue moon, supermoon week

Super Blue Moon 2024 astrology predictions are out and we have listed Zodiac-wise horoscope details for the upcoming week in August.

19 Aug, 2024, 05:38 PM IST

Rare super blue moon to grace the sky during Raksha Bandhan festivities; All you need to know

Super Blue Moon: On August 19, skywatchers will witness a rare super blue moon, combining a supermoon with a blue moon. Visible from August 19 to 22, this celestial event is notable for its size and brightness. The blue moon, occurring as the third full moon in a season with four, will not appear blue but will be 14% larger and 30% brighter than a typical full moon. The event is a rare occurrence, making it a significant moment for observers.

19 Aug, 2024, 11:43 AM IST

Rare combination of Super Moon, Blue Moon today in India. Check timings, astrological significance for you and how to watch

A rare supermoon and Blue Moon combination illuminated the skies today. This event coincided with Raksha Bandhan in India. Astrologers noted its potential emotional and intuitive impacts.

19 Aug, 2024, 08:39 AM IST

CSK CEO denies franchise request to retain MS Dhoni as uncapped player amid BCCI rumors

Chennai Super Kings (CSK) CEO Kasi Viswanathan has denied reports that the franchise requested MS Dhoni be retained as an uncapped player for the next IPL season. The BCCI may reinstate a rule allowing franchises to keep retired international players as uncapped, a policy removed in 2021. If reintroduced, this could help CSK retain Dhoni at a lower cost. Dhoni, who stepped down as captain, will decide his IPL future based on the final rules from the BCCI.

18 Aug, 2024, 06:30 PM IST

Ferrari or Lamborghini, it's a luxury quite a few can afford

A Lamborghini booked now will be delivered only in 2026 or later, as the supercar maker has sold all units its Italian headquarters allocated for India. The company retails the Huracan, Urus and Revuelto in India, with the on-road price ranging from â‚¹5 crore to â‚¹10 crore.

17 Aug, 2024, 06:40 AM IST

Perfect start: Kylian Mbappe scores on debut for Real Madrid in win over Atalanta in UEFA Super Cup

Kylian Mbappe's competitive debut for Real Madrid was highlighted by a goal in a 2-0 win against Atalanta in the UEFA Super Cup. Federico Valverde scored the first goal while Mbappe netted the second from a Jude Bellingham assist. Madrid celebrated its record sixth Super Cup triumph with coach Carlo Ancelotti commending the team's performance.

16 Aug, 2024, 12:14 AM IST

Govt working towards restoring lost brand image of Andhra: CM Chandrababu Naidu

Andhra Pradesh CM N Chandrababu Naidu announced efforts to restore the state's brand image on the 78th Independence Day. He criticized the previous YSRCP government for setbacks and highlighted the TDP government's focus on governance, welfare schemes, job creation, and infrastructure. Promises from their super six scheme have already been implemented.

15 Aug, 2024, 02:07 PM IST

SC rejects plea against NMC's decision to not hold NEET-SS exam this year

The Supreme Court dismissed a plea challenging the National Medical Commission's (NMC) decision not to conduct the NEET-Super Speciality (NEET-SS) exam this year. A bench led by Chief Justice D Y Chandrachud found the NMC's decision to be "fairly equitable" and chose not to alter the exam schedule.

14 Aug, 2024, 05:12 PM IST

South African pacer Morne Morkel named India's bowling coach

Morne Morkel has been appointed as the new bowling coach for the Indian men's cricket team, replacing Paras Mhambrey. He will start his tenure with the Bangladesh series beginning on September 19, and continue until the end of the 2027 ODI World Cup in South Africa. Morkel, a former South African pacer, was the top choice of India's head coach Gautam Gambhir, having worked together in the IPL. Morkel's experience and prior collaborations made him the preferred candidate over Lakshmipathy Balaji and R Vinay Kumar.

14 Aug, 2024, 05:05 PM IST

Earn up to 8.85% FD rate: RBL Bank launches 'Vijay Fixed Deposits'; check details

RBL Bank has launched a special fixed deposit termed as 'Vijay Fixed Deposits'. It has been designed to show appreciation for our military men. This limited-period offer pays tribute to the courage and sacrifices of our brave soldiers while providing exceptional financial benefits.

14 Aug, 2024, 12:48 PM IST

This Raksha Bandhan, expect a rare Super Blue Moon. Will the moon turn blue?

On August 19, 2024, a full Moon coincided with Raksha Bandhan, marking a special event where a supermoon and a Blue Moon converged. The Moon appeared exceptionally bright and large, making it a noteworthy celestial event. The next similar occurrence is projected for January and March 2037.

13 Aug, 2024, 03:36 PM IST

Kolkata doctor's rape-murder triggers nationwide strike at govt hospitals; OPDs, surgeries hit

Resident doctors in India have gone on an indefinite strike to protest the rape and murder of a trainee doctor in Kolkata. The strike is in response to a call from the Federation of Resident Doctors' Association (FORDA), which said the strike won't stop unless justice is served and demands are met. The strike will be halted in outpatient departments, operation theatres, and ward duties, but emergency services will continue as usual.

12 Aug, 2024, 09:56 PM IST

India has the skill, but not the European pace: New head coach of the Indian men's football team Manolo Marquez

Manolo Marquez has a clear-eyed view of the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead for Indian football. His extensive experience in Europe and now in India provides him with a unique perspective on the current state of the game in the country and where it could be heading in the coming years.

11 Aug, 2024, 09:56 PM IST

Lamborghini bets big on India's long-term potential

Lamborghini projected significant growth in India, with the potential to be a top market in the Asia Pacific region. The company sold a record 103 units in 2023 and aims for 150 annual sales by 2026. India has the youngest customers worldwide, with an average age below 40, and benefits from growing infrastructure and a thriving start-up culture.

11 Aug, 2024, 01:12 PM IST

Goa calling! Sun, sand and now super luxury villas

Goa's luxury villa market has seen increased demand from affluent buyers such as startup founders and sportspersons. Developers have shifted focus towards ultra-luxury projects to cater to this clientele. DLF is set to launch a project with high-cost villas, highlighting the trend of investment preference towards luxury holiday homes.

04 Aug, 2024, 11:44 PM IST

KBC 16 new rule update: Amitabh Bachchan's show introduces 'Super Sawaal' twist. Check details

Kaun Banega Crorepati returns for its 16th season on August 12, 2024, with Amitabh Bachchan introducing an exciting new feature called the 'Super Sawaal.' This special segment, appearing after the fifth question, allows contestants to double their prize money without lifelines, adding a high-stakes twist to the game. Contestants who answer the 'Super Sawaal' correctly can use the 'dugaanastra' power to double their winnings on one of the questions between six and ten.

04 Aug, 2024, 05:10 PM IST
